meta.title: An Overview of the Lohorung Region

nodes.body: The Lohorung are a Rai ethnic group of eastern Nepal who speak a Tibeto-Burman language of the same name. According to the 2001 census of Nepal, 1,207 people speak Lohorung as a mother tongue. (Mark Turin – June 01, 2004)
nodes.title: An Overview of the Lohorung Region
